item.title: The Contributor's Guidelines
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: Want to become a contributor? Thank you kindly for taking the time to give everyone a hand! ðŸ˜„ To make it as smooth and as pleasant as possible for everyone to work together, we’ll ask you to: Communicate. Let people know what you’re working on, join discussion on the issues, and open your own! Be and mindful of the contributors’ and the maintainers’ time. Everyone here is providing their expertise benevolently.
